channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Instead of Fitbit’s AI Health Coach, You Could Just Have Friends
item.description: I used the public preview of Fitbit’s new AI Health Coach and became both faster and noticeably weirder.

item.title: This Hacker Conference Installed a Literal Anti-Virus Monitoring System
item.description: At New Zealand's Kawaiican cybersecurity convention, organizers hacked together a way for attendees to track CO2 levels throughout the venue—even befo...

item.title: KitchenAid Promo Code: $250 Off in November 2025
item.description: Save on every purchase with top KitchenAid coupons from WIRED, including up to $250 off select products this Black Friday.

item.title: A Viral Chinese Wristband Claims to Zap You Awake. The Public Says 'No Thanks’
item.description: The maker of the eCoffee Energyband says it electrically stimulates your nerves to keep you alert. Researchers are skeptical, and critics see it as a ...

item.title: The European startup market is ready for the limelight
item.description: The region's startup market is hungry for its first trillion-dollar startup, and in many ways has set itself up to reach that goal.

item.title: A $100 Million AI Super PAC Targeted New York Democrat Alex Bores. He Thinks It Backfired
item.description: Leading the Future said it will spend millions to keep Alex Bores out of Congress. It might be helping him instead.

item.title: WhatsApp gets its own Instagram Notes-like feature
item.description: WhatsApp users can now share their status with others through a new "About" feature.

item.title: Joby Aviation makes ‘corporate espionage’ claims in lawsuit against rival Archer
item.description: Joby alleges one of its former employees shared stolen trade secrets when he was hired by Archer.

item.title: Grok says Elon Musk is better than basically everyone, except Shohei Ohtani
item.description: According to Grok, Elon Musk can out-slug the MLB's greatest power hitters... except Ohtani.

item.title: Google steps up AI scam protection in India, but gaps remain
item.description: Google is expanding its real-time scam-detection and screen-sharing fraud warnings in India.
